params.prompt: The video features an adorable Pikachu nestled under a blanket, its fur glowing softly in the warm light. At first, its eyes remain closed in peaceful rest, but then they gently open, sparkling with childlike charm. Pikachu begins to speak, its voice sweet and playful, carrying the innocence of joy. The expression on its face is full of cuteness, as if it is sharing something happy with the world. The cozy folds of the blanket surround it, adding to the tender scene. The camera remains fixed, focusing only on Pikachu’s face and little gestures, capturing every detail of its animated expression. With each word, its cheerful tone brings warmth and delight, turning the moment into a scene filled with irresistible cuteness and heartwarming energy.
params.negative_prompt: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走
